item.description: Joint with meetup group"The New England Hiking&Adventurer,s Group",we will be the slower group,will summit if conditions are good.Trailhead:Cannon Mountain Aerial Tramway parking lot exit off of I93.Will hike the Greenleaf Trail.Although it is April,pack winter gear.It should not be cold,but can be windy,the wind can make it feel cold.Bring snow shoes,ski poles and traction devices.This is a strenuous hike.7.6 miles round trip,elevation gain 3300 feet,9 hours estimated time. Steve
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: Mt. Lafayette
